Dynamo Designs

Full-Stack developer

A DBA name created and owned by myself for web development purposes. I utilize Amazon DynamoDB flexible NoSQL database services for consultations and full-stack contract work.

Verizon Wireless

Contract Frontend Web Developer

Created responsive marquees, web pages and banners with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript on Adobe Experience Manager for B2C and B2B customers. Utilized JSON to connect Verizon’s database of phones and prices to customer facing sales pages. Debugged defective post-launch web pages for Verizon’s campaigns.

Penguin Random House

Digital Production Associate

I convert and manage books to digital format or eBooks. Some of the tools I use daily are Adobe Suites "Creative Cloud" (Primarily InDesign and Photoshop) to create Immersive eBooks. I'm also using HTML and CSS editors in my process as well.
